> <OLD - Talon>
>
> "Yes"replied the femme "We finally will take our friend to home"


<NEW>

With all the new found help, it only takes a few moments to get
everyone stowed on the shuttle and for it to take off towards the Ark.

After a short while the shuttle turns and lands on top of the ark
connecting to one of the upper ports that has been modified to handle
beings of smaller dimensions.

"Leo, Tuscon." LORD ELDER called over the comlink as BANTOR was taken
off the shuttle by AIR HAMMER and TORCA, "A few more Maximals have
arrived in response to the call for all Maximals to return to the
Ark."

(TAG)

Preston
